Sentencas: Yttria-doped zirconia electrolytes (e.g., 8 mol% yttria-stabilized ZrO2, 8YSZ) have been considered to be the most promising candidates for applications in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: Due to the ubiquitous presence of SiO2 impurities and wide use of Ni-containing anodes, it is therefore of great technical importance to understand the synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on densification, grain growth and ionic conductivities (especially the grain boundary (GB) conduction) of zirconia electrolytes.
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: In this study, three groups of 8YSZ ceramics, with Si contents of similar to 30, similar to 500 and similar to 3000 ppm, have been designed.
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes
Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: at% NiO was added into these materials by a wet chemical method.
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: The addition of SiO2 has a negative effect on the sintering and densification, while the introduction of I aft NiO reduced the sintering temperature and promotes grain growth of the zirconia ceramics.
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: However, the presence of small amount of NiO prevented full densification of 8YSZ ceramics.
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: NiO also led to a decrease by similar to 33% in grain interior (GI) conductivity, with little effect on the GB conduction of high-purity 8YSZ(similar to 30 pprn SiO2).
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: However, the coexistence of NiO and SiO2 is extremely detrimental to total conductivity by significantly reducing the GB conduction.
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: Moreover, it is observed that, unlike the 8YSZ-doped SiO2 with only, whose GB conduction increases greatly with increasing sintering temperature, the GB conduction of the NiO and SiO2 codoped samples is less sensitive to sintering temperature.
Titulo: Synergetic effect of NiO and SiO2 on the sintering and properties of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes
